item.title: Trump upbraids U.N. in speech, claiming ‘your countries are going to hell’
item.description: Trump blasted the U.N. for its focus on migration and climate change, calling global warming a “con job.”

item.title: Trump says United Nations is not living up to its potential as he addresses organization
item.description: Trump is addressing world leaders as he struggles to broker peace in Russia’s war with Ukraine and Israel’s war in Gaza.

item.title: Trump says he has ‘solved’ 7 conflicts. Here’s what to know about them.
Following his remarks to the U.N. General Assembly — in which he heavily criticized the organization...
Trump’s U.S. attorney pick could put him on collision course with Senate
item.description: It’s unclear whether Virginia’s Democratic senators will support Lindsay Halligan if her nomination as U.S. attorney comes before the Senate.
